name: Akka
description: Akka is a toolkit for building highly concurrent, distributed, and resilient message-driven applications for Java and Scala. Its underlying concurrency model is based on [Actor Model|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Actor_model], with inspiration drawn from [Erlang|https://www.erlang.org/]

name: HTTP and RESTful API design
description: The Hypertext Transfer Protocol, the transport layer of web application.

name: Java programming language
description: Java is a general purpose language that's Object Oriented (class-based) with support for concurrency. Originally developed by James Gosling at Sun Microsystems, now acquired by Oracle.

name: Apache Maven
description: A software project management and comprehension tool

name: SBT, interactive build tool
description: The industry-standard build tool for Scala

name: Scala programming language
description: The Scala programming language, invented by Martin Odersky, is a general-purpose programming language providing support for functional programming and a strong static type system.
